doctor.name: Dr. Mirza Mohammad Tyeabul Islam
doctor.specialty: Burn, Plastic, Reconstructive & Cosmetic Surgery Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Mirza Mohammad Tyeabul Islam is a Plastic Surgeon in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Plastic Surgery). He is a Assistant Professor & Head, Burn & Plastic Surgery at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Cumilla Medical Center Pvt. Ltd. (Tower Hospital). Practicing hour of Dr. Mirza Mohammad Tyeabul Islam at Cumilla Medical Center Pvt. Ltd. (Tower Hospital) is 3pm to 7pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.hospital: Cumilla Medical Center Pvt. Ltd. (Tower Hospital)
chamber.address: Comilla Tower, Laksam Road, Kandirpar, Cumilla - 3500

doctor.name: Dr. Kazi Imran Ahmed (Sohel)
doctor.info: Dr. Kazi Imran Ahmed (Sohel) is a Plastic Surgeon in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Plastic Surgery), MRCS (UK). He is a Assistant Professor, Plastic Surgery at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Moon Hospital, Comilla. Practicing hour of Dr. Kazi Imran Ahmed (Sohel) at Moon Hospital, Comilla is 3pm to 6pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Shahid Khawaja Nizamuddin Road, Jhautola, Cumilla
